body_html:
@ebrevdo I've though that some work was being done to change how RNNs and LSTMs work because of https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/82ff4cd8b0d541ede107d34d8eecc769c91dda11/tensorflow/models/rnn/rnn_cell.py
And the stale documentation in master with regards to that.

And in fact this commit, by you.
396b586

body:
@ebrevdo I've though that some work was being done to change how RNNs and LSTMs work because of https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/82ff4cd8b0d541ede107d34d8eecc769c91dda11/tensorflow/models/rnn/rnn_cell.py
And the stale documentation in master with regards to that.
